docs.title: Event Management Plugin Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for the Event Management Plugin. This guide will help you install, configure, and use the plugin to manage your events efficiently.

docs.title: Table of Contents
docs.text: • Getting Started

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The Event Management Plugin provides a comprehensive solution for organizing, scheduling, and managing events. Whether you're hosting small meetups or large conferences, this plugin streamlines the entire process.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Easy event creation and editing
  • Attendee registration and management
  • Automated email notifications
  • Customizable event pages
  • Integration with calendar apps

docs.title: Need Help?
docs.text:
If you have questions or need assistance, please refer to the Support section.

Start exploring the documentation using the links above!

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to the Demo Project! This guide will help you set up and run the project quickly.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Node.js (v14 or higher)
  • Git

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository: 

    git clone https://github.com/your-username/demo-project.git
cd demo-project

  2. Install dependencies: 

    npm install

docs.title: Running the Project
docs.text:
Start the development server:

npm start

Visit http://localhost:3000 in your browser.

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
• Explore the src/ directory to see the code.
  • Check out the Documentation for more details.

Happy coding!
